item.title: 1 small error
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Find: PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
Under that put:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: 1 small error

item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

startAnimation(1068);
specialDamage = 14 + misc.random(6);
specialDamage2 = 14 + misc.random(6);
if (DoubleHit == true) }
specialAmount -= 25;
}
}

Does that work?

item.title: 1 small error
item.dc:creator: @barrage_pker barrage pker
item.description:
@barrage_pker wrote:

sorry if this is in the wrong section mvoe it if it is please

ok well im tryying 2 add dds double spec i put this code in

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {//dagger startAnimation(1068); specialDamage = 14 + misc.random(6); specialDamage2 = 14 + misc.random(6); if (DoubleHit == true) { specialAmount -= 25; }
when i compile i get this error
client.java:14923: illegal start of expression public void ProjectileSpec(int startID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, i nt offsetX, int index, int enemyY, int enemyX) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
CAN ANYONE HELP? when i remove that code and put this
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {//dagger startAnimation(1068); specialDamage = 14 + misc.random(6); specialDamage2 = 14 + misc.random(6); specialAmount -= 25; }
THE ERROR IS GONE ANYONE HELP?
